column1: '''''laure'''''<ref name=PE17/><ref name=L230/><ref name=etym/> (or '''''laurë'''''<ref name=silmap/><ref name=UTG/>) is a [[Quenya]] word glossed as:
#"gold, not the metal but the colour, what we would should call golden light"<ref name=L230>{{L
#"golden colour of sunshine or golden flowers"<ref name=PE17>{{PE
#"light of the golden Tree ''Laurelin'', gold"<ref name=etym>{{LR
In the manuscript "Eldarin Roots and Stems", ''laure'' derives from [[Sundocarme

column3: mother-name]] of [[Finarfin]] due to his golden hair of his mother's people<ref name=morg>{{MR

column1: *[[Laurelin]], "Song of Gold"; name of one of the [[Two Trees]] of [[Valinor]]<ref name=silmindex>{{S

column2: Laurelindórenan]], "Valley of Singing Gold";<ref name=UTG/> and older name for [[Lothlórien]]<ref name=rotk>{{TT

column1: *Laurenandë, "Valley of Gold"; another name for Lothlórien<ref name=UTG/>

*''[[laurinquë]]'', possible "gold-ful one";<ref name=arda>[[Helge Fauskanger]], ''[[Ardalambion]]'', [http://www.uib.no/people/hnohf/wordlists.htm Quenya Wordlists]</ref> a tree in [[Hyarrostar]] in [[Númenor]] with yellow flowers<ref name=uttree>{{UT
*Makalaurë, "forging gold"; a prophetic mother-name for [[Maglor]]<ref name=pome>{{PM
'''''laure''''' is a [[Qenya]] word meaning "gold". The word derives from [[Sundocarme
